settings.title: Settings
settings.languageDescription: Choose the display language for the application
settings.themeDescription: Choose a theme that works best for you
settings.darkModeDescription: Reduces eye strain, good for nighttime use
settings.pwaInstallDescription: Install this app on your device for offline use and better experience

about.title: About Folda-Scan
about.description: Folda-Scan is a local folder scanning tool that can monitor changes in your project folder in real-time. It supports .gitignore rules and provides project structure reporting and version management features.
about.copyright: Â© 2024 Folda-Scan Team. All rights reserved.

folderPicker.noPermission: Failed to get folder access permission

scanControls.observerFallback: Note: FileSystemObserver available but not enabled, falling back to polling

versionManager.title: Versions
versionManager.backupInfo: Describe the changes in this version, e.g. 'Completed login module'
versionManager.confirmRestore: Are you sure you want to restore this version? Current unbacked changes will be lost.

resultDisplay.selectFolderPrompt: Please select a folder and click the 'Start Scan' button

statistics.title: Project Statistics
statistics.commentsHelp: Shows all comments in the project to help you understand code documentation
statistics.noComments: No comments found in the project
statistics.noFolder: Please select a project folder first
statistics.startScan: Click the "Rescan" button to start analyzing the project

codeStructure.noStructuresFound: No code structures found. Please ensure your project contains supported code files.
codeStructure.visualizationHelp: Drag nodes to adjust positions. Shows relationships between code structures.
